Title: Requires the office of renewable energy siting and electric transmission to establish a mapping, installation and efficiency plan for the purpose of building new electric transmission lines
Summary: Requires the office of renewable energy siting and electric transmission to establish a mapping, installation and efficiency plan for the purpose of building new electric transmission lines.
LawCode: Add ยง149, Pub Serv L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the public service law, in relation to expanding electric transmission lines throughout the state of New York
